Subject: Continuing Talks with Hell Beast
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:


"Very well." Shockwave intoned.  "I suppose we may talk here."

He waited a second to speak, maybe for suspense.  "I am Shockwave of Old.  
Former Decepticon Emperor in the time of Megatron the First's absence from 
Cybertron on Earth.  I am with a group of several other Decepticons from the 
old times that have taken Predacon form to be able to move around with less 
difficulty."

"We were thinking of obliterating you and taking over your operation, but we 
have reconsidered our plot and decided it was faulty.  Instead we offer you a 
compromise that may be beneficial to both parties.  We merge our groups, 
Decepticon and Predacon to form a new Empire.  The Neo Decepticon Empire.  
With your brute force and knowledge of the planet and most of the factions, 
and our sheer intellect and own power and knowledge, we will rule this little 
mudball and spread the reach of the Decepticon Empire to throughout the 
Universe as was our goal millions of years ago.  But there are no longer 
Autobots to stop us."

"We have seen the Maximals in combat.  They are pathetic.  I predict a 45% 
difficulty in our planned assault on Cybertron in two dozen stellar-cycles.  
The Alliance alones defeats the best Maximal technology.  We Decepticons know 
more about Cybertron than the most 'brilliant' Maximal scientists.  It would 
only be logical for us to merge and crush all of them."

Shockwave held out his right hand to Hell Beast.  "Do you accept our generous 
offer?"
